Method Detail

getVar

public net.sf.javabdd.BDD getVar(String str)
Return a copy of the BDD with just the variable in it. If it's not there, then it creates one. If we are out of variable numbers, then we increase them. A copy of the BDD is returned to prevent freeing of variables and their index numbers.

getName

public String getName(int i)
Get the variable name given the bdd variable number

Whether the given variable name is part of the variable set
